response.original_title: Homosexuality in the Military: Meinhold v. United States—A Department of Defense Documentary
response.overview: Volker Keith Meinhold was discharged from the United States Navy after stating he was gay during a television interview. Meinhold sued in federal court and a three-judge panel of the Ninth Circuit ruled unanimously that the Navy could not discharge Petty Officer Meinhold merely because he said he is gay. This documentary showcases segments of the court hearing.
response.title: Homosexuality in the Military: Meinhold v. United States—A Department of Defense Documentary
